entries.title: Google Changes Appeals Process for Suspected Child Abuse Images
entries.description: People who upload images of children that Google flags as potentially illegal will be able to provide more context to appeal bans.

entries.title: Tesla Had a Bad Year. Some Investors Are Blaming Elon Musk.
entries.description: Investors blame Elon Musk and wonder how much more the stock will fall.

entries.title: Librarians Are Meeting Younger Readers Where They Are: TikTok
entries.description: The pandemic hurt children’s reading skills. Librarians are doing what it takes to connect them with books — including dance routines.

entries.title: Turning Sports Statistics Into Riveting Cinema
entries.description: Jon Bois and his collaborators specialize in documentaries about seemingly unremarkable teams. Then he wields charts and graphs to spellbinding effect.

entries.title: Tim Wu, Architect of Biden Antitrust Push, to Leave White House
entries.description: Tim Wu has been a leading proponent of a more aggressive approach to reining in the power of big business.
